snippet.title: The Truth About ARC Raiders...
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders is an incredible game, but after hitting level 75 and completing every quest, the cracks are starting to show. In this video, Codiak breaks down the biggest issues holding ARC Raiders back—from late spawns and free loadout imbalance to weapon exploits, desync, Trials problems, blueprint frustrations, and more.

0:00 Intro
1:05 Loadouts & Late Spawns
3:45 Spawn Points
5:12 Key Room Glitching
6:36 The Trouble With Trials
7:59 Terrain Inconsistencies & Mantling
8:51 Weapon Balance
10:44 Desync Issues
11:30 Blueprints
12:38 Quests & Rewards
13:35 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders
